attributes.action: Bring back the 10p tax rate for low paid workers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is totally unfair for the lowest paid workers to have a 100% increase in their tax bills while the richest people get richer by having an effective reduction in their tax bill.
Bring back the 10p rate for low paid workers and tax the higher paid the extra 10p

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
